title: Person
description: Schema for person in metadata returned by the search API.

full_name.description: The fullest representation of the person's name available in arXiv metadata.

last_name.description: The family or surname part of the person's name, if available.

first_name.description: The personal or forename part of the person's name, if available.

suffix.description: The suffix part of the person's name, if available.

affiliation.description: Institutional affiliation as entered at the time of submission, if available.

is_submitter.description: Indicates whether this person is the submitter of this submission
